tool_description: Automatically assigns tickets to appropriate agents based on skills, workload, priority, and escalation requirements using intelligent matching algorithms.

priority_level.description: Ticket priority level (low, medium, high, critical)

required_skills.description: Skills required to handle this ticket

escalation_level.description: Current escalation level (l1, l2, l3, specialist)

geographic_preference.description: Preferred geographic region for agent assignment

error_messages: Invalid priority level: Priority must be one of [low, medium, high, critical]. Check priority evaluation.
Invalid customer tier: Customer tier must be one of [basic, premium, enterprise]. Verify customer classification.
Invalid escalation level: Escalation level must be one of [l1, l2, l3, specialist]. Check escalation path.
Invalid assignment mode: Mode must be one of [balanced, expertise, fastest]. Use a supported strategy.
No qualified agents: No agents available with required skills and escalation level. Consider skill requirements or escalation path.
Skills list empty: At least one skill must be specified in required_skills array.
usage: Provide ticket details, priority, skills, and escalation level to get assignment recommendations. The tool considers agent availability, workload, and skill matching for optimal assignment.

alternative_agents.description: List of alternative agent IDs if primary assignment fails

assignment_reason.description: Explanation of why this agent was selected
